text: Chowdhury Kamal Ibne Yusuf (1940 - 9 December 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a leader of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. From 2001 to 2004, he was Minister of Disaster Management and Relief. From 2004 to 2006, he was Minister of Food. Yusuf died of COVID-19 at a Dhaka hospital on 9 December 2020, aged 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Dhaka Division Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Chowdhury Kamal Ibne Yusuf
